info.title: HBF CORE API
info.description: This is the API documentation for HBF-CORE.

tags.name: Robots txt Resource
tags.description: Indicates to crawlers not to index

tags.name: User account recovery Resource
tags.description: Contains endpoints to allow user to reset password

tags.name: Tenant Public Data Resource
tags.description: Contains endpoints for retrieving public Tenant data

tags.name: Deployment Public Data Resource
tags.description: Contains endpoints for retrieving public Bot Deployment data

tags.name: Automated Tests
tags.description: API endpoints for managing automated tests

tags.name: User email verification Public Resource
tags.description: Contains endpoints for user email verification
